Join RIO datasets with vector lookup

rio_lookup.Rd

This function joins data from a RIO dataset based on a vector of IDs.

Usage

rio_lookup(conn = NULL, ids, resource_id, id_field, reference_date = NULL)

Arguments

conn

A connection object created with rio_api_connection(). If NULL, a new connection will be created.

ids

A vector of IDs to look up.

resource_id

The ID of the dataset resource to retrieve.

id_field

The name of the ID field in the dataset.

reference_date

Optional date to filter valid records. Default is the current date.

Value

A tibble with data for the specified IDs.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Get institution data for specified IDs
institution_ids <- c("12345", "67890")
institutions <- rio_lookup(
  ids = institution_ids,
  resource_id = "institution-resource-id",
  id_field = "INSTELLINGSCODE"
)
} # }
